description_zh: 每天分享一条高质量链接，涵盖科技、科学、实用工具等领域
description_en: Share a high-quality link every day, covering fields such as technology, science, and practical tools.
submitRequirements_zh: 投稿内容尽可能简短，快速突出产品重点。
submitRequirements_en: Make your submission as brief as possible and quickly highlight the key features of your product.
rating_zh: 开发者可在网站内投稿产品。也可以通过公众号 521link 投稿。收录后会同步至小报童、公众号
rating_en: Developers can submit their products on the website. They can also submit through the official WeChat account 521link. After being included, the products will be synced to Xiaobaotong and the official WeChat account.
